title: 我的世界如何阻止玩家进入暮色，或者给暮色布下范围结界？？？？？
author: a971911548
txt_content: 我的世界如何阻止玩家进入暮色，或者给暮色布下范围结界？求解求解

replies.author: sanityko
replies.txt_content:
config文件夹里的TwilightForest.cfg文件
有如下设定：
    # Allow portals only for admins (ops).  This severly reduces the range in which the mod usually scans for valid portal conditions, and it scans near ops only.
    B:AdminOnlyPortals=false

将其更改为
    # Allow portals only for admins (ops).  This severly reduces the range in which the mod usually scans for valid portal conditions, and it scans near ops only.
    B:AdminOnlyPortals=true

重启服务器后便只有op才能通过暮色门进入暮色了

replies.author: a971911548
replies.txt_content:
